Package org.fermi.method

Public interface to the Fermi Framework for Java to JavaScript remote method invocation (RMI).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JsonDecoder<T>
    A Java class that wishes to be unmarshalled automatically from a JSON representation must implement this interface.
    JsonEncoder
    A Java class that wishes to be marshalled automatically into a JSON representation must implement this interface.
    Result
    Representation of the return value of a remote JavaScript function invocation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JsonDecoderSimple
    A collection of implementations of the JsonDecoder interface for a variety of commonly used Java types: String, String[], Long, Long[], Boolean, Boolean[].
    JsonDecoderSimple.Boolean  
    JsonDecoderSimple.BooleanArray  
    JsonDecoderSimple.Long  
    JsonDecoderSimple.LongArray  
    JsonDecoderSimple.String  
    JsonDecoderSimple.StringArray  
    JsonEncoderSimple
    A collection of implementations of the JsonEncoder interface applicable to a variety of commonly used Java types: String, String[], Long, Long[], Boolean, Boolean[].
    Method
    Representation of a remote JavaScript function.

Package org.fermi.method Description

Public interface to the Fermi Framework for Java to JavaScript remote method invocation (RMI). This package contains classes that represent remote methods, their parameters and results. It also has a number of built in JSON decoders and encoders for marshalling common Java data types.
Since:
1.0
